text: Dabangii Mulgii aayi re aayi is an Indian Hindi-language drama television series premiered on Sony Entertainment Television, and digitally streams on Sony LIV. Produced by Herumb Khot and Nilanjana Purkayasstha under Invictus T Mediaworks, it stars Maahi Bhadra, Manav Gohil, Aamir Dalvi, Sai Deodhar, Asawari Joshi, Himani Chawla and Yashashri Masurkar. == Plot == In a riveting tale of power, violence and family, a spirited young girl, Arya, grapples with the contrast between who she believes her father is and who he actually turns out to be. She attempts to resolve the debate of nature vs nurture while growing up in a chaotic world. == Cast == The series stars * Maahi Bhadra as Arya Rajyavadhkar: Satya and Damini/Chhaya’s daughter, Vishwanath and Avdabai’s granddaughter, Bela and Ankush’s niece * Manav Gohil as Ankush Rajyavadhkar: Vishwanath and Avdabai’s younger son; Satya’s younger brother; Chhaya’s brother-in-law; Bela’a husband, Zai’s father Arya’s uncle * Aamir Dalvi as Satya Rajyavadhkar: Vishwanath and Avdabai’s elder son; Ankush’s older brother, Damini’s husband, Sai’s uncle, Tanmay and Arya’s father , Kasturi's husband. * Sai Deodhar as Damini Rajyavadhkar (presumed as Chhaya): Satya’s wife; Arya’s mother; Vishwanath and Advabai’s daughter-in-law; Ankush’s sister-in-law * Himani Chawla as Kasturi Rajyavadhkar: A prostitute by past profession - Tanmay's mother ; Vishwanath and Avdabai’s daughter-in- law; Satya’s second wife * Jaywant Patekar as Vishwanath Rajyavadhkar : Avdabai's husband ; Satya and Ankush's father ; Bela , Damini and Kasturi's father in law ; Arya , Tanmay and Zai's grandfather * Bharati Patil as Avdabai Vishwanath Rajyavadhkar: Satya and Ankush’s mother, Damini, Bela and Kasturi’s mother-in-law, Zai, Arya and Tanmay’s grandmother * Asawari Joshi * Yashashri Masurkar as Bela Ankush Rajyavadhkar: Ankush’s wife, Zai’s mother, Vishwanath and Avdabai’s daughter-in-law, Satya’s sister-in-law ; Arya's aunt and mother figure == Production == The series was announced on Sony Entertainment Television with Maahi Bhadra, Aamir Dalvi, Manav Gohil, Sai Deodhar, Asawari Joshi, Himani Chawla and Yashashri Masurkar joining the cast. The principal photography of the series commenced from October 2023 at the Film City, Mumbai. ==Reception== Professional reviews Professional reviews Review scores Review scores Source Rating India Today The Times of India == References == == Other websites == * Dabangii Mulgii aayi re aayi on SonyLIV Category:2023 Indian television series debuts Category:2020s Indian television series
title: Dabangii
